sub_title: Associate Professor Regenerative Vascular Medicine, department of nephrology&hypertension UMC Utrecht
summary:
Associate professor, Principle Investigator Vascular Regeneration (UMCU speerpunt Regenerative Medicine), department of nephrology and hypertension, UMC Utrecht, 1/3/2013 
Specialties: Experimental Research, Cardiovascular Disease, Vascular regeneration

Co-founder and scientific coordinator of the RECONNECT consortium

Principle investigator project 3D bioprinting of vascularized organs:
https://www.vriendenumcutrecht.nl/Projecten/rm-en-stamcellen/3d-bioprinten/

Consultant for Cardiogenx, focus: therapeutics

Experience and Professional Memberships: 

Member of organizing committee for the annual international symposium of Biomechanics in cardiovascular disease: shear stress in vascular biology (2006 and 2007, international). 

Member of organizing committee for the annual international symposium for vulnerable plaque research (Vulnerable Plaque Meeting) VPM congress (2009 and 2010, international).

Member of the organization committee of the Dutch German cardiovascular meeting (2010, international).

Contributed and organized Erasmus MC cardiovascular research school (Coeur) lectures (from 2006 onwards, national): (I) Molecular Biology in cardiovascular research and atherosclerosis, (II) Atherosclerosis, Inflammation and vulnerable plaque, (III) Vascular Remodelling: from cell to vessel structure, (IV) Zebrafish in cardiovascular research, and (V) Molecular aspects of angiogenesis. 

Frequent invited contributor to the journal Trends Cardiovasc. Med. (IF: 4.1).
